score.title: CONFIDENTIAL CONTENT
paragraphs: "At nights in Brasilia, with all that luxury, all morals are gray" -- Millôr Fernandes

When a corruption scheme ends up in Fiasco, it gets a Federal Police operation with a sophisticated codename that breaks into your home, followed closely by reporters from your favorite TV news show ********************. Even in Brasilia - a perfect place for ******************** shady deals and schemes - with the well known proportion of 300 crooks for each 2,5 thousand inhabitants, things can go very wrong ********************.

In "300 Crooks", contacts and influence are the things that go in your favor. Therefore, it is only fair that the person who starts playing is the one with the most contacts in his or her cell phone ********************.

Another striking characteristic of this playset is the dossier of the Federal Police operation that reveals the details of the game you just played and ********************. Therefore, don't forget, at the Aftermath, to choose a name for that operation so that we can file it properly ********************.
